ygData.subject: Hello everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I been busy since last post. For those of you who don t know me, (that s everyone) I am on Saryrn server. I have 2 characters I play. First is Fepony lvl
ygData.messageBody:
Well I been busy since last post. For those of
you who don't know me, (that's everyone) I am on
Saryrn server. I have 2 characters I play. First is
Fepony lvl 52 woodelf druid, and Leggo lvl 51 ogre
warrior. I am member of Ancient Council guild. I got this
game from my daughter on March 26 2001. I am not
twinked or PL'ed. If there is anything I can do to help
any of you just let me know.....I'll try. I do know a
few tricks that can really help with abilities and
skills. Leggo is pretty much maxed out in all skills and
abilities. Druids are different....I am solo druid so far. I
am considering trying to get to 60 solo. Yeah
right!!! :) Anyone else on Saryrn holler me
up!<br><br>Fepony Spellcaster<br>52 Wanderer Woodelf<br>Priest of
Tunare<br>Defender of Ancient Council<br><br>Leggo Oribarshu<br>51
Champion Ogre<br>Bringer of Death<br>Defender of Ancient
Council
